name: Parker's Stars
description:
Parker's Stars - a fun adventure for the whole family. Collect as many coins of different values of space . But not all so simple , astronaut Stark Parker in danger of flying toward asteroids of all sizes and shapes. Fortunately , he does not go into space without his jet pack.

Tilting the phone and using the accelerometer , you help Parker become the most successful astronaut of all time !

PS : Im not good in graphics so used free for use assets for this game, if any one can draw cool stuffs fill free to contact me
